title: Large Orange Diamond
description: A larger version of the small orange diamond emoji.
apple_vendor_description: This large orange diamond emoji on Apple devices shines with an internal fire, its facets catching imaginary light sources to create a stunning display of brilliance. Rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded edges, it evokes a sense of opulence and exceptional beauty. The vibrant, warm orange hue and the gemâ€™s substantial presence make it a striking symbol of luxury, rarity, or something incredibly valuable on Apple devices.
